text:
Пользователь спрашивает о логике API Nordwheel, почему когда стоит чекбокс "Со склада Лавсит", в отправленном запросе тип отправления "terminal", и проверяет, меняется ли фиасный код города.


## Investigating user query  
- The user is asking about the logic behind the Nordwheel API, specifically related to the "From Lavsit Warehouse" checkbox.  
- They want to understand why selecting this checkbox results in a "terminal" shipment type in the sent request.  

## Examining city FIAS code  
- The user is also checking if the FIAS code of the city changes with the checkbox selection.  
- This involves verifying how the API handles location data based on warehouse settings.

## Analyzing Nordwheel API Logic  
- The `calculateNordWheel` function in app/page.tsx includes `getDispatchLocation` to determine shipment type and location.
